ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit (Neeranchal National Watershed Project) to India The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of Internatibnal Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to India a credit in an amount equivalent to one hundred and sixteen million four hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 116,400,000). The purpose of said credit is to support the Integrated Watershed Management Program through technical assistance to improve incremental conservation outcomes and agricultural yields for communities in selected sites, and adoption of more effective processes and technologies into the broader Integrated Watershed Management Program in Participating States. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project towards the financing of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of India and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of India.

Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance.
